title: CHAT-Based International Cultural Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and international work experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing global cultural understanding through a scientific approach for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three international collaboration scenarios using the Cultural-Historical Activity Theory (CHAT) framework over nine weeks
Learners can identify at least two social rules and labor distribution systems in target cultures by applying scientific methodologies
Learners can document five or more instances of agency expression during learning processes through reflective journals and develop improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
